This power function will be used to perform repeated multiplication of our transition matrix.

```{r}
power <- function(m, k) {
  r <- m
  for (i in 2:k) {
    r <- r %*% m
  }
  return(r)
}
```

# Chapter 11.3 Exercise 5

Find the fixed probability vector $w$ for each of the following regular matrices.

## a

```{r}
(p <- matrix(c(3/4,1/2,1/4,1/2),2,2))
power(p,1000)
```

$w = (2/3, 1/3)$

\newpage

## b

```{r}
(p <- matrix(c(9/10,1/10,1/10,9/10),2,2))
power(p,1000)
```
$w = (1/2, 1/2)$

## c

```{r}
(p <- matrix(c(3/4,0, 1/4, 1/4, 2/3, 1/4, 0, 1/3, 1/2),3,3))
power(p,1000)
```

$w = (2/7, 3/7, 2/7)$
